    A factory used to create AVRO readers.

    A factory used to create AVRO readers.

    sqlConf

    SQL configuration.

    broadcastedConf

    Broadcast serializable Hadoop Configuration.

    dataSchema

    Schema of AVRO files.

    readDataSchema

    Required data schema of AVRO files.

    partitionSchema

    Schema of partitions.

    parsedOptions

    Options for parsing AVRO files.
